code:
module TopModule (
    input clk,
    input reset,
    output reg [3:0] q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 4'b0001; // Reset to 1
        end else begin
            if (q == 4'b1010) begin
                q <= 4'b0001; // Wrap around to 1 after 10
            end else begin
                q <= q + 4'b0001; // Increment the counter
            end
        end
    end

    initial begin
        q = 4'b0001; // Initialize to 1
    end

endmodule
